title: Xbox Doesn’t Need Bethesda on PlayStation - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.16.20
description:
Elaine Gomez from Latinx in Gaming tries to console Greg as he deals with next-gen Avengers and its Kate Bishop DLC being delayed. Plus, Phil Spencer talks about Bethesda on PlayStation.

 Follow Elaine: https://twitter.com/chulatastic

00:00:00 - Start
00:06:10 - Housekeeping
Two HUGE streams today
Gary and I are debuting Vice President Joe Biden’s island in Animal Crossing RIGHT after this episode on Twitch. It’ll be up later on youtube.com/kindafunnygames
After that, Bless and I play Ghost of Tsushima Legends.
Donktober continues tomorrow with Blessing and Barrett playing DK64. Noon. twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Black Jack, & Tom Bock
The Roper Report   -
00:07:15 -  Xbox Doesn’t Need Bethesda on PlayStation, Stephen Totilo @ Kotaku
00:21:15 - Avengers Delays Next-Gen Upgrades, Kate Bishop
00:31:15 - NPD For September, Darryn Bonthuys @ GameSpot
00:34:35 - PS5 Accessories Shipping Early? Jeremy Winslow @ GameSpot
00:38:50 - Analogue making a new TurboGrafx and PC Engine Console, Zack Zwiezen
00:43:35 -  UPSTART 
00:45:02 -  DoorDash 
00:46:10@jeff -  BESPOKE 
00:48:15 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:51:15 -  - The Nano Biologist
00:55:00 - Squad Up:Michael(Xbox) - musicisblood
01:00:00 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Blessing, Tim
TUESDAY: Imran, Fran
WEDNESDAY: Greg, David Jagneaux
THURSDAY: Tim, Greg
FRIDAY: Greg, Blessing
